about_the_game:
The Unfettered is an upcoming action role-playing video game developed by Trender Software on the Unreal Engine 4. The game in the souls-like genre revolves around a mysterious and warrior woman. Wanted for years as the "chosen one" by the gods, this character is tasked with battling underground monsters that have turned the world into a land of the dead, pandemonium and ruin.
The final release date of the game, which is set to be released for Windows, has not yet been determined.

THE NEW DARK-FANTASY ACTION RPG
Now is the time to take on demonic souls by identifying with the warrior selfness of Lura, heir to the legendary bird. Feel the power within you with The Unfettered.

DISCOVER MYSTERIES
A heroical adventure awaits you every step you take in the sacred land. Take your place as a mighty warrior in a land of ruins, vast landscapes and dazzling designs. At the end of each battle, double the satisfaction of your success.

LIVE THE LEGENDS
Be the protagonist of a precious story that dates back to ancient times. Experience this epic drama to the fullest with ambitious passions.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Adult Content.
